title: PrepWise
description: A Next.js application that lets users create custom job interviews, practice with a voice-based AI assistant, and receive detailed feedback to improve their performance.

title: Awwwards Web Style
description: A web application built with React and GSAP to master high-performance animations in modern web development, following JS Mastery's course.

title: Xora App
description: A web application built with React and Vite, serving as a review of Tailwind and React for creating static pages, following the JS Mastery course.

title: Movies React App
tagline: React-powered movie search with TMDB API
description: A sleek movie discovery application built with React and Vite, featuring real-time search, detailed movie insights, and multi-language support. It leverages the TMDB API for rich movie data and includes modern UI components like loading spinners and error alerts.

title: Fast Pizza
description: A React-based application for managing pizza orders with dynamic components and state handling, delivering an interactive and fluid user experience.

title: Bankist
tagline: Modern banking UI with smooth animations and lazy loading
description: A sleek, interactive banking interface featuring smooth scrolling, modal forms, tabbed components, and performance-optimized animations like sticky navigation and lazy image loading.

title: Curriculum Minimalista
tagline: CV web imprimible basado en JSON Resume
description: Un generador de currículum minimalista y funcional, construido con Astro y TypeScript, que transforma datos estructurados en JSON en un CV web elegante y listo para imprimir. Inspirado en diseños modernos y optimizado para desarrolladores.

title: Natours
tagline: API para gestionar tours y reservas
description: Proyecto backend desarrollado con Node.js como parte de un curso avanzado. Incluye autenticación, autorización, manejo de datos y API RESTful. Basado en las mejores prácticas de desarrollo backend con Node.js, Express, y MongoDB.
